results.title: Metformin ameliorates thymus degeneration of mice by regulating mitochondrial function.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ ameliorates @<m>DISEASE_Thymus_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013953 @@@thymus degeneration@@@ of @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ by regulating mitochondrial function.

citations.NLM: Yang SP, Su Q, Zhang YR, Sun Y, Chai YR. Metformin ameliorates thymus degeneration of mice by regulating mitochondrial function. Int Immunopharmacol. 2022 Jul;108():108744. PMID: 35395467
citations.BibTeX: @article{35395467, title={Metformin ameliorates thymus degeneration of mice by regulating mitochondrial function.}, author={Yang SP and Su Q and Zhang YR and Sun Y and Chai YR}, journal={Int Immunopharmacol}, volume={108}, pages={108744}}

results.title: [Metformin effect on urethane-induced tumorigenesis in mice].
results.text_hl: Twenty five of 31 (96.7%) control group @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ developed @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumors@@@ (@DISEASE_Lung_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung adenomas@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Thymus_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013953 @@@thymic lymphomas@@@), while @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ development was observed in 25 of 31 (80.7%; p<0.05) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ exposed to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Popovich IG, Piskunova TS, Tyndyk ML, Anikin IV, Zabezhinskiĭ MA, Anisimov VN. [Metformin effect on urethane-induced tumorigenesis in mice]. Vopr Onkol. 2012;58(4):549-53. PMID: 23607214
citations.BibTeX: @article{23607214, title={[Metformin effect on urethane-induced tumorigenesis in mice].}, author={Popovich IG and Piskunova TS and Tyndyk ML and Anikin IV and Zabezhinskiĭ MA and Anisimov VN}, journal={Vopr Onkol}, volume={58}, number={4}, pages={549-53}}

results.title: Antidiabetic (type 2) effects of Lactobacillus G15 and Q14 in rats through regulation of intestinal permeability and microbiota.
results.text_hl: Combination of Q14 and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reversed the @<m>DISEASE_Thymus_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013953 @@@thymic atrophy@@@ and both G15 and Q14 lowered the circulating @GENE_IL6 @GENE_24498 @@@IL-6@@@ level, indicating the immune-modulating potential of the strains.

citations.NLM: Tian P, Li B, He C, Song W, Hou A, Tian S, Meng X, Li K, Shan Y. Antidiabetic (type 2) effects of Lactobacillus G15 and Q14 in rats through regulation of intestinal permeability and microbiota. Food Funct. 2016 Sep 14;7(9):3789-3797. PMID: 27713957
citations.BibTeX: @article{27713957, title={Antidiabetic (type 2) effects of Lactobacillus G15 and Q14 in rats through regulation of intestinal permeability and microbiota.}, author={Tian P and Li B and He C and Song W and Hou A and Tian S and Meng X and Li K and Shan Y}, journal={Food Funct}, volume={7}, number={9}, pages={3789-3797}}
